name: waba-fullstack
description: Waba Full-Stack Application with React Frontend and Node.js Backend

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.clean: cd frontend && rm -rf dist && cd ../backend && rm -rf dist
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
